alert.note: Alert for St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 3:40PM EDT until August 31 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. Lawrence County in northern New York... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 339 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Hammond, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Gouverneur, Fowler, Richville, Hermon, Russell, Rossie, Edwards, Talcville, Nelson Corner, Fullerville, North Gouverneur, Balmat, West Fowler, West Pierrepont and South Russell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
